settings.chapter_rules_description:
Current supported chapter detection rules:

1. Chinese chapter format:
   • 第[一二三四五六七八九十\d]+章[：:\s]*.*
   • 第[一二三四五六七八九十\d]+节[：:\s]*.*

2. English chapter format:
   • Chapter\s+\d+[：:\s]*.*
   • Section\s+\d+[：:\s]*.*

3. Numeric chapter format:
   • ^\d+\s+.*

These rules use regex matching and support:
- Chinese and Arabic numerals
- Colon and space separators
- Chapter title content

You can modify these rules through the "Edit Rules" button or add new detection patterns through the "Add Rule" button.

parameter_descriptions.temperature: Controls generation randomness, higher values are more random. Range: 0.1-2.0, Recommended: 1.0
parameter_descriptions.top_p: Nucleus sampling parameter, controls candidate word selection range. Range: 0.1-1.0, Recommended: 0.8
parameter_descriptions.top_k: Top-K sampling parameter, limits candidate word count. Range: 1-100, Recommended: 30
parameter_descriptions.repetition_penalty: Controls repetition content penalty level. Range: 1.0-20.0, Recommended: 10.0
parameter_descriptions.max_mel_tokens: Limits generated Mel tokens count. Range: 100-1000, Recommended: 600

parameter_descriptions.temperature: Controls the randomness of generated text, higher values are more random
parameter_descriptions.top_p: Nucleus sampling parameter, controls vocabulary selection diversity
parameter_descriptions.top_k: Top-K sampling parameter, limits candidate vocabulary count
parameter_descriptions.repetition_penalty: Repetition penalty parameter, reduces repetitive content
parameter_descriptions.max_mel_tokens: Maximum number of Mel spectrum tokens
